Dear Harry:
I shall accept your invitation to be a member of the NAEB
Research Committee.
I may not be able to attend *U conventions and meetings Mr.
Greenhill and I have agreed that a reasonable division of labor
would be for him to act as Penn State's principal contact with
NAEB. Therefore, when 1 can't attend, perhaps Les can
"stand-in" for ms.
I hope that I can make reasonable contributions to your organi¬
sation.
Sincerely,
CRC:jr
C. R. Carpenter
Director
